name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Ringed Reticle | Shell Shockers Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Shell Shockers Theme only editing the Scope ADS and hipfire crosshair

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed by twitch.tv/KJDCitsme, this Shell Shockers Theme is completely vanilla, apart from the scope, crosshairs, top kill streak icon, and amunition icon. The sole purpose of this theme is to help improve aiming capabilities while using Crackshot, Free Ranger, and RPEGG. Version 1.2.1 Now Works Smoothly with the new Shell Shockers Weapon Rebalance!
